titlepage.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory to the David Edward Charles Eversley Papers, 1935-1994
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California

defitem.label: Processed by:
defitem.item: Rebecca J. Mead and Katherine Reynolds

titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: David Edward Charles Eversley Papers,

physdesc.label: Collection Size
physdesc.extent: 178 manuscript boxes, 4 oversize boxes, 3 linear feet

did.abstract: Speeches and writings, correspondence, studies, reports, memoranda, notes, agenda, minutes, statistical data, printed matter, and maps, relating to population studies, including urbanization, immigration, and family planning; and urban and regional planning, including housing and other social and economic planning aspects, especially in London, elsewhere in England, Northern Ireland, and West Germany.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], David Edward Charles Eversley papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1989.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

did.unittitle: Speeches and writings. Proofs, typescripts, outlines, correspondence, charts, and bulletins; includes manuscripts entitled "Rising Costs and Static Incomes: Some Consequences of Regional Planning in London" and "The Planner in Society: An Essay on the Future of British Planning," 1943-1975

Center for Environmental Studies, Social Science Research Council. Reports, correspondence, clippings, memoranda, charts, printed articles, lists, notes, press releases, and administrative material, 1967-1988
Greater London Council. Correspondence, memoranda, reports, printed articles, clippings, charts, and miscellany, 1963-1983
General
General. Includes material relating to transportation, housing, health and safety, town planning, employment, architecture, and the Strategic Programme Planning Board
Commercial and industrial development
Docklands
Housing. Includes material relating to immigrants, home ownership, and land availability
Greater London Development Project. Reports, memoranda, notes, correspondence, printed articles, hearing transcripts, press releases, charts, and miscellany, 1970-1978
General
General
Reports
Transcripts
"Tomorrow's London". Reports, memoranda, correspondence, notes, typescripts, clippings, and photographs, 1968-1970
London Tourism Board. Clippings, reports, correspondence, pamphlets, and memoranda; includes some material relating to census data, housing, and the Greater London Council, 1968-1972

Overseas population and fertility. Reports, program statements, pamphlets, manuals, printed articles, and miscellany; includes material relating to urbanization, migration and immigration, family planning, and public health, 1963-1981
Population and planning conferences. Pamphlets, correspondence, printed material, notes, memoranda, reports, agenda, and miscellany, 1967-1979
Regional Studies Association. Printed articles, notes, charts, questionnaires, correspondence, reports, agenda, minutes, clippings, and lists, 1982-1983
Standing Conference on London and South East Regional Planning. Memoranda, reports, notes, and correspondence, 1966-1979
Incremental materials

scopecontent.p: This addition to the collection has not yet been described. Please let the Hoover Institution Archives know if you would like to see this material described.
